title: Version Update Introduction
content:
ðŸ“Œ New AI Mark feature: Let AI remember any file for you, so you can find files faster later, or ask questions.
ðŸ“Œ OCR feature: To save computer resources, visual indexing is now provided by OCR service: it only extracts text from images, no longer uses AI models to summarize images. If needed, you can use AI Mark on images.
ðŸ“Œ Added right-click menu: You can right-click on search results to use AI Mark.
